description.english: Completed the prologue
description.german: Prolog abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé le prologue.
description.italian: Hai completato il prologo
description.spanish: Has completado el prólogo.
description.schinese: 已完成序章
description.tchinese: 已完成序章
description.japanese: ソロストーリーをクリアした
description.brazilian: Concluiu o prólogo
description.latam: Completaste el prólogo.

displayName.german: Wir hoffen, es hat Ihnen hier gefallen
displayName.brazilian: Espero que a estadia tenha sido agradável
displayName.latam: Esperamos que hayas disfrutado tu estadía

description.english: Completed the Solo Story
description.german: Solostory abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé l'histoire solo.
description.italian: Hai completato la modalità Storia in singolo
description.spanish: Has completado la Historia propia.
description.schinese: 已完成“单人故事”
description.tchinese: 已完成「單人故事」
description.japanese: ソロストーリーをクリアした
description.brazilian: Concluiu a História solo
description.latam: Completaste la historia individual.

description.english: No-one survived
description.german: Keiner hat überlebt
description.french: Personne n'a survécu.
description.italian: Non ci sono stati superstiti
description.spanish: No ha sobrevivido nadie.
description.schinese: 无人生还
description.tchinese: 無人生還
description.brazilian: Ninguém sobreviveu
description.latam: Nadie sobrevivió.

description.english: Everyone survived
description.german: Alle haben überlebt
description.french: Tout le monde a survécu.
description.italian: Sono sopravvissuti tutti
description.spanish: Han sobrevivido todos.
description.schinese: 全员幸存
description.tchinese: 全員倖存
description.brazilian: Todos sobreviveram
description.latam: Todos sobrevivieron.

description.english: The dog made it off the island alive
description.german: Der Hund hat die Insel lebend verlassen
description.french: Le chien a quitté l'île sain et sauf.
description.italian: Il cane è fuggito vivo dall'isola
description.spanish: El perro salió vivo de la isla.
description.schinese: 狗狗已活着逃离岛屿
description.tchinese: 狗狗已活著逃離島嶼
description.brazilian: O cachorro saiu vivo da ilha
description.latam: El perro salió vivo de la isla.

description.english: Charlie survived the furnace
description.german: Charlie hat den Brennofen überlebt
description.french: Charlie a survécu à l'incinérateur.
description.italian: Charlie è sopravvissuto alla fornace
description.spanish: Charlie sobrevivió al horno.
description.schinese: 查理已成功逃离火炉
description.tchinese: 查理已成功逃離火爐
description.brazilian: Charlie sobreviveu à fornalha
description.latam: Charlie sobrevivió al horno.

description.english: Kate and Jamie both escaped the glass trap
description.german: Kate und Jamie sind der Glasfalle entkommen
description.french: Kate et Jamie ont survécu au mur de verre.
description.italian: Kate e Jamie sono fuggite dalla trappola di vetro
description.spanish: Kate y Jamie escaparon de la trampa de cristal.
description.schinese: 凯特和洁蜜已一起逃离玻璃陷阱
description.tchinese: 凱特和潔蜜已一起逃離玻璃陷阱
description.russian: Кейт и Джейми выжили в ловушке со стеклянной стеной.
description.brazilian: Kate e Jamie saíram da armadilha de vidro
description.latam: Kate y Jamie escaparon de la trampa de vidrio.

description.english: Mark got the lighthouse working
description.german: Mark hat den Leuchtturm in Gang gekriegt
description.french: Mark a remis le phare en état de marche.
description.italian: Mark ha rimesso in funzione il faro
description.spanish: Mark arregló el faro.
description.schinese: 马克已让灯塔重新运作
description.tchinese: 馬克已讓燈塔重新運作
description.brazilian: Mark fez o farol funcionar
description.latam: Mark hizo funcionar el faro.

description.english: The crew didn't trust Charlie and he paid the price
description.german: Die Crew hat Charlie nicht vertraut und er musste dafür büßen
description.french: L'équipe n'a pas fait confiance à Charlie et il en a payé le prix fort.
description.italian: La troupe non si è fidata di Charlie, che ne ha pagato le conseguenze
description.spanish: El equipo no confió en Charlie y él pagó por ello.
description.schinese: 团队不相信查理，他已因此付出代价
description.tchinese: 團隊不相信查理，他已因此付出代價
description.russian: Группа не поверила Чарли и он за это поплатился.
description.brazilian: A equipe não confiou em Charlie e ele pagou o preço
description.latam: El equipo no confió en Charlie y él pagó el precio.

description.english: Kate fell for Du'Met's impersonation
description.german: Kate ist auf Du'Mets Schauspiel hereingefallen
description.french: Kate a été dupée par l'imitation de Du'Met.
description.italian: Kate ha creduto all'interpretazione di Du'Met
description.spanish: Kate se creyó la suplantación de Du'Met.
description.schinese: 凯特已受到杜梅特的伪装欺骗
description.tchinese: 凱特已受到杜梅特的偽裝欺騙
description.brazilian: Kate caiu na imitação de Du'Met
description.latam: Kate se creyó la imitación de Du'Met.

description.english: Mark agreed to Du'Met's proposal
description.german: Mark hat getan, was Du'Met von ihm wollte
description.french: Mark a accepté la proposition de Du'Met.
description.italian: Mark ha accettato la proposta di Du'Met
description.spanish: Mark accedió a la propuesta de Du'Met.
description.schinese: 马克已同意杜梅特的提案
description.tchinese: 馬克已同意杜梅特的提案
description.brazilian: Mark concordou com a proposta de Du'Met
description.latam: Mark aceptó la propuesta de Du'Met.

description.english: Jamie reset the fuse box
description.german: Jamie hat den Sicherungskasten wieder in Gang gesetzt
description.french: Jamie a réinitialisé la boîte à fusibles.
description.italian: Jamie ha riparato il quadro elettrico
description.spanish: Jamie reinició la caja de fusibles.
description.schinese: 洁蜜已重置保险丝盒
description.tchinese: 潔蜜已重置保險絲盒
description.brazilian: Jamie reiniciou a caixa de fusíveis
description.latam: Jamie reinició la caja de fusibles.

description.english: Charlie's hand was crushed
description.german: Charlies Hand wurde zerquetscht
description.french: La main de Charlie a été broyée.
description.italian: Charlie si è schiacciato la mano nel muro
description.spanish: La mano de Charlie acabó aplastada.
description.schinese: 查理的手已被压断
description.tchinese: 查理的手已被壓斷
description.brazilian: A mão de Charlie foi esmagada
description.latam: La mano de Charlie fue aplastada.

description.english: Jamie and Erin kissed
description.german: Jamie und Erin haben sich geküsst
description.french: Jamie et Erin se sont embrassées.
description.italian: Jamie ed Erin si sono baciate
description.spanish: Jamie y Erin se besaron.
description.schinese: 洁蜜和艾琳已接吻
description.tchinese: 潔蜜和艾琳已接吻
description.brazilian: Jamie e Erin se beijaram
description.latam: Jamie y Erin se besaron.

description.english: Yes, you can pet the dog
description.german: Ja, du darfst den Hund streicheln
description.french: Oui, vous pouvez caresser le chien.
description.italian: Sì, puoi accarezzare il cane
description.spanish: Sí, puedes acariciar al perrete.
description.schinese: 当然，你可以摸摸这只狗狗
description.tchinese: 當然，你可以摸摸這隻狗狗
description.brazilian: Sim, você pode fazer carinho no cachorro
description.latam: Sí, puedes acariciar al perro.

description.english: Kate and Mark rekindled their relationship
description.german: Kate und Mark haben es noch einmal miteinander versucht
description.french: Kate et Mark ont ravivé la flamme de leur relation.
description.italian: Kate e Mark hanno salvato il loro rapporto
description.spanish: Kate y Mark reavivaron su relación.
description.schinese: 凯特和马克已重新建立起彼此的关系
description.tchinese: 凱特和馬克已重新建立起彼此的關係
description.brazilian: A chama de amor entre Kate e Mark foi reacendida.
description.latam: Kate y Mark reavivaron su relación.

description.english: Jamie chose to sacrifice herself in the glass trap
description.german: Jamie hat sich selbst in der Glasfalle geopfert
description.french: Jamie a choisi de se sacrifier au mur de verre.
description.italian: Jamie ha scelto di sacrificarsi nella trappola di vetro
description.spanish: Jamie decidió sacrificarse en la trampa de cristal.
description.schinese: 洁蜜已在玻璃陷阱选择牺牲自己
description.tchinese: 潔蜜已在玻璃陷阱選擇犧牲自己
description.russian: Джейми пожертвовала собой в ловушке со стеклянной стеной.
description.brazilian: Jamie decidiu se sacrificar na armadilha de vidro
description.latam: Jamie decidió sacrificarse en la trampa de vidrio.

description.english: Jamie chose to save Erin in the suffocation chamber
description.german: Jamie hat Erin aus dem Erstickungsraum gerettet
description.french: Jamie a choisi de sauver Erin de l'asphyxie.
description.italian: Jamie ha scelto di salvare Erin dalla stanza dell'asfissia
description.spanish: Jamie decidió salvar a Erin en la cámara de asfixia.
description.schinese: 洁蜜已选择拯救窒息室内的艾琳
description.tchinese: 潔蜜已選擇拯救窒息室內的艾琳
description.russian: Джейми спасла Эрин из вакуумной камеры.
description.brazilian: Jamie decidiu salvar Erin na câmara de sufocamento
description.latam: Jamie decidió salvar a Erin en la cámara de asfixia.

displayName.german: Bis dass der Tod uns scheidet, Teil 2
displayName.french: Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous rassemble
displayName.spanish: Hasta que la muerte nos separe
displayName.brazilian: Até Que a Morte Nos Separe 2
displayName.latam: Hasta que la muerte nos separe 2

description.english: Jeff and Marie watched each other die
description.german: Jeff und Marie mussten sich beim Sterben zusehen
description.french: Jeff et Marie se sont regardés mourir.
description.italian: Jeff e Marie hanno assistito l'uno alla morte dell'altra
description.koreana: 제프와 마리가 서로 죽어가는 것을 바라봄
description.spanish: Jeff y Marie se vieron morir mutuamente.
description.schinese: 杰夫和玛莉已看着对方死去
description.tchinese: 傑夫和瑪莉已看著對方死去
description.russian: Джефф и Мари наблюдали за смертью друг друга.
description.brazilian: Jeff e Marie assistiram a morte um do outro
description.latam: Jeff y Marie se vieron morir el uno al otro.

description.english: Charlie maintained control during dinner
description.german: Charlie behielt während des Abendessens die Kontrolle
description.french: Charlie a su calmer les esprits pendant le dîner.
description.italian: Charlie ha mantenuto il controllo durante la cena
description.koreana: 찰리가 저녁 식사 중 이성을 유지함
description.spanish: Charlie mantuvo el control durante la cena.
description.schinese: 查理已在晚餐时间控制住局面
description.tchinese: 查理已在晚餐時間控制住局面
description.russian: Чарли держал себя в руках во время ужина.
description.brazilian: Charlie manteve o controle durante o jantar
description.latam: Charlie mantuvo el control durante la cena.

description.french: Vous avez réparé toutes les boîtes à fusibles.
description.italian: Hai riparato tutti i quadri elettrici
description.spanish: Has arreglado todas las cajas de fusibles.
